resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
a recipe for cabbage or grape leaves
stuffing for cabbage-cousa or grape leaves
 
1# gr. beef
3/4 cup rice
3/4 t salt
1/2 t blk pepper
1/2 t cinnamon
1/2 t allspice
1/3 cup lemon juice
resource.chars:
a recipe for cabbage or grape leaves

stuffing for cabbage-cousa or grape leaves

 

1# gr. beef

3/4 cup rice

3/4 t salt

1/2 t blk pepper

1/2 t cinnamon

1/2 t allspice

1/3 cup lemon juice
